items.question: How do I paste to Notion?
items.answer: After conversion, click the copy button, then press Ctrl+V (Mac: Cmd+V) in your Notion page. Images will display automatically.

items.question: Where are images stored?
items.answer: Images are permanently stored in Cloudflare R2 cloud storage. When you paste to Notion, Notion copies images to its own servers.

items.question: Is there a file size limit?
items.answer: You can upload files up to 20MB.

items.question: Is my uploaded PDF safe?
items.answer: PDF files are automatically deleted from our server after 24 hours. We don't store or analyze them.
